title: 【冒险】PUMPKIN HERO|南瓜英雄|多人联机|神秘冒险|GAHLIFREX
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:21 编辑 





简介INFOThe pumpkins were kidnapped and you must save them!Experience a diversified map, from a beautiful nature to deep dark caves. Be a hero of an entire civilisation, think in portals blocks and test yourself in a real bossfight.Compatible for 1 - 3 playersNon PvP, other instructions ingameVersion 1.0, so please report bugsPuzzles, exploring, secrets and an epic battle
Can you be the Pumpkin Hero?

南瓜被绑架了你必须要救他们！
在这个多样化的地图积累经验，从多彩的自然到黑暗的矿洞。做一个文明的英雄，想一下传送门和与BOSS一战！
-可以支持1~3人游玩
-不能PVP，其他在游戏里有写
-版本比较新，所以希望可以回复BUG
-地图有解密、探索、秘密和一个大战。
你要当南瓜英雄吗？
